page.title: 11INDUSTRY IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: Most industries in our area are based on small workshop principles such as Haleacre.The trades include chair upholstery,glass blowing,polytecnics, antique dealers,porcelain repairers, kitchen unit manufactures,printer, detergent manufactures.Also there are four engineering companies.They work 60 hours a week.In Hazlemere there is a plumbing and heating engineer and a builders merchant.The Chiltern Trading Estate is in Earl Howe Road and has eighteen small industries including a piano restorers and importers.There is a small separate firm which makes children's clothes and employs seventeen people.Chiltern Timber Heating is a family business selling wood burners and boilers.They have little trade in the summer so have opened a herb centre which sells over a hundred varieties of herbs .
